CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also reported that angular - fused NDT has a lower - lying HOMO energy level than that of linearfused NDT , which could be beneficial for better air stability and greater open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) for polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Angular
2. Linear
3. NDT (Non-Doped Track)
4. PSC (Polymer Solar Cells)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

Angular
Linear
NDT
PSC
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. Angular
2. NDT

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to a Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Angular |
| NDT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also reported that angular - fused NDT has a lower - lying HOMO energy level than that of linearfused NDT , which could be beneficial for better air stability and greater open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) for polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Angular
2. Linear
3. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
4. Lying
5. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)

Note: In this context, "Property Name" refers to the names of the properties or characteristics of the entities being discussed, rather than the entities themselves.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
2. Lying (not a material property)
3. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)

I apologize for the mistake earlier. Let me know if you have any further questions!

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |
| V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also reported that angular - fused NDT has a lower - lying HOMO energy level than that of linearfused NDT , which could be beneficial for better air stability and greater open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) for polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. HOMO energy level: This is a property value of a molecule or material, specifically the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in the case of angular-fused NDT.
2. V oc: This is another property value, specifically the open-circuit voltage (V oc) of polymer solar cells (PSCs).

So, the two property values mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO energy level
2. V oc
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO energy level: This is a property value of a molecule or material, specifically the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in the case of angular-fused NDT.
2. V oc: This is another property value, specifically the open-circuit voltage (V oc) of polymer solar cells (PSCs).

So, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO energy level
2. V oc

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material property values, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| V oc |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
